import React from "react" import Navbar from '../Navbar/Navbar' import SideBar from '../util/SideBar' import ListeStages from './ListeStages' import {BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch} from 'react-router-dom' import '../student/student.css'; import InfoStage from './infoStage/InfoStage' import Conversation from '../util/conversation/Conversation' function ChefDept(){ const menu=[{menu:"Liste des stages",icon:"fas fa-list",to:"/"},{menu:"Planning PFE",icon:"fas fa-calendar-alt",to:"/chefDept/planning"}] return(
) } export default ChefDept;
